text: ve vahaan chillaenge ki "ai hamaare rab! hamen nikaal le. ham achchha karm karenge, usase bhinn jo ham karate rahe." "kya hamane tumhen itanee aayu nahin dee ki jisamen koee hosh mein aana chaahata to hosh mein aa jaata? aur tumhaare paas sachetakarta bhee aaya tha, to ab maza chakhate raho! zaalimonn ko koee sahaayak nahin
